preview: Katie steps into a hallway. A bell sounds in the distance.

text: Katie steps into a hallway. A bell sounds in the distance.
Katie looks both ways down the hall. Completely desolate.

preview: Katie opens the door into an empty Hair/Makeup room. She

text: Katie opens the door into an empty Hair/Makeup room. She
crosses the room and sits at a VANITY MIRROR.
She looks at herself in the mirror: not a pretty sight. She
grabs a makeup wipe and begins to clean herself up.
As she works, facing the mirror, there's a FLICKER of
movement at the door. She doesn't notice.
Something CREAKS behind her. She turns around.
Katie turns back to the mirror and retouches her lip liner.
Behind her, a SHADOWY HAND picks up a pair of SCISSORS and
She turns. Her eyes widen. She opens her mouth to scream --
but it's too late. The scissors PLUNGE into the side of her
Blood trails out of her eyes like tears. Her lifeless body
hits the table with a thud, the scissors lodged in her skull.

Jess is taken aback -- she wasn't expecting that answer.

preview: Jess sits down on the couch. She rubs her temples and sighs.

text: Jess sits down on the couch. She rubs her temples and sighs.
She eyes a photo of her and Leylah on her phone background.
She looks around the living room -- it's still a mess.
Jess picks up a WELCOME PACKET sent by Love at Last. On the
cover page is a photo of a BEACHSIDE MANSION. It looks
She picks up her phone and calls GABE.
